titles.title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for a project or program named for an individual then serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the United States Congress.
To prohibit the use of Federal funds for a project or program named for an individual then serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the United States Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Organization, Efficiency, and Financial Management.

committee.name: House Oversight and Accountability
committee.subcommittee: Government Operations and the Federal Workforce

bill.summary: Prohibits the use of federal funds for a project or program named for an individual currently serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the U.S. Congress.
